$interpreted: Leah: ... Strange, we've already arrived at the Sunshine Infantry. Why is nobody here to welcome us?
Leah: HELLO~! IS ANYONE HERE~!
Elio: Leah, you shouldn't be so loud-
Soldier: It's the remaining forces of Sunshine Infantry!
Leah: Kingdom of the Sun army? They've already captured this location!?
Elio: Everyone, protect yourselves!
Leah: Where is my brother! Where did you people take him? Tell me now, you wretched evil soldiers!
Lio: Sis~!
Leah: Lio!
Lio: It has been a long time, sis. I miss you so much...
Leah: I-Idiot... if you're okay then make a damn sound! You got me worried sick...
Lio: Hehe, I knew my big sis would win, and I was right!
Lio: Oww! That hurts!
Leah: Also, for something as major as "being picked up by the princess in secret", How dare you make that decision yourself without telling me beforehand!?
Lio: I did write a letter...but the mailing routes between Rune Academy and Totemtaff have been restricted...
Leah: About that, the princess already told me! Doesn't change the fact that I'm still very mad!
Leah: ...I'm sorry. I wasn't around when the incident happened. I was so happy when I discovered that you are safe...
Lio: Sis...it's not your fault, no worries.
Elio: So, ummm... what is all this about?
Hyde: Apologies, young fellas~
Hyde: This is just a surprise exam we prepared to test out everyone's abilities.
Hyde: Seems like everyone here indeed has a few tricks up their sleeves~
Elio: ...If so, I wonder whether we survived your elimination test or not...
Angelia: My sincere apologies, everyone. Forgive us for our uncourtly conduct. As an apology and welcoming to the Infantry,
Angelia: we've prepared a banquet. Please, enjoy yourselves.
Lio: I'll lead the way. Sis, and everyone else, please follow me!
Hyde: With the addition of these people, the Infantry's combat power should be sufficient for now.
Angelia: Hyde, you will be in charge of Sunshine Infantry for now, as Colonel Levon is tending his injuries. Also, find out if we have a spy or not.
Angelia: Naya and I will get started on the preparation for the next mission.
Hyde: Understood. You two, please be careful.
Elio: May I have a minute?
Elio: I don't want to be merely stationed in the infantry.
Elio: The reason for my enlistment was to follow princess Angelia. Wherever princess desires to go, please take me with you. Is that ok?
Angelia: Hmm... I remember you. You're Elio, right?
Angelia: I can't make a hasty decision regarding this issue. Join the banquet for now. I will inform you of the decision later.
Elio: ... Yes, ma'am. Understood.
Angelia: Hyde, what do you think?
Hyde: In terms of combat ability, he's more than capable of helping out princess.
Hyde: On top of it, he is headmaster Ceres's foster child. With him at your side, you can use leverage to get Rune Academy involved if necessary.
Angelia: Agreed. Then we'll allow him to accompany us.
Angelia: Naya, is something bothering you?
Naya: Not really... I just feel like... Angel, it seems that you've really changed.
Naya: If this was you in the past, you would've never measured someone's value with personal interests in mind...
Angelia: ......
Angelia: ... Because I don't want to lose again.
Naya: I get that; I want to win as well! But, I'm still worried that...
Angelia: I'm a leader now. I have to guide everyone to victory in this war.
Angelia: If I put too much emotion into any of my decisions, then we will never be able to reach the end goal of reclaiming the kingdom.
Naya: .....
Naya: ...To be frank with you, I don't really understand.
Angelia: Naya...!?
Naya: My friend is the simple and lovable Angel. For a mere soldier like me, I really can't understand the high-and-mighty princess Angelia.
Hyde: Security officer Rosset, you've mistaken what the princess meant. The Princess- as well as all of us; we all truly need your strength.
Naya: Is that so?
Naya: I'll go make the preparations for the trip. Strategist Hyde, princess Angelia, I'll take my leave.

Model.Text: ... Strange, we've already arrived at the Sunshine Infantry. Why is nobody here to welcome us?
HELLO~! IS ANYONE HERE~!
Leah, you shouldn't be so loud-
It's the remaining forces of Sunshine Infantry!
Kingdom of the Sun army? They've already captured this location!?
Everyone, protect yourselves!
Where is my brother! Where did you people take him? Tell me now, you wretched evil soldiers!
Sis~!
Lio!
It has been a long time, sis. I miss you so much...
I-Idiot... if you're okay then make a damn sound! You got me worried sick...
Hehe, I knew my big sis would win, and I was right!
Oww! That hurts!
Also, for something as major as "being picked up by the princess in secret", How dare you make that decision yourself without telling me beforehand!?
I did write a letter...but the mailing routes between Rune Academy and Totemtaff have been restricted...
About that, the princess already told me! Doesn't change the fact that I'm still very mad!
...I'm sorry. I wasn't around when the incident happened. I was so happy when I discovered that you are safe...
Sis...it's not your fault, no worries.
So, ummm... what is all this about?
Apologies, young fellas~
This is just a surprise exam we prepared to test out everyone's abilities.
Seems like everyone here indeed has a few tricks up their sleeves~
...If so, I wonder whether we survived your elimination test or not...
My sincere apologies, everyone. Forgive us for our uncourtly conduct. As an apology and welcoming to the Infantry,
we've prepared a banquet. Please, enjoy yourselves.
I'll lead the way. Sis, and everyone else, please follow me!
With the addition of these people, the Infantry's combat power should be sufficient for now.
Hyde, you will be in charge of Sunshine Infantry for now, as Colonel Levon is tending his injuries. Also, find out if we have a spy or not.
Naya and I will get started on the preparation for the next mission.
Understood. You two, please be careful.
May I have a minute?
I don't want to be merely stationed in the infantry.
The reason for my enlistment was to follow princess Angelia. Wherever princess desires to go, please take me with you. Is that ok?
Hmm... I remember you. You're Elio, right?
I can't make a hasty decision regarding this issue. Join the banquet for now. I will inform you of the decision later.
... Yes, ma'am. Understood.
Hyde, what do you think?
In terms of combat ability, he's more than capable of helping out princess.
On top of it, he is headmaster Ceres's foster child. With him at your side, you can use leverage to get Rune Academy involved if necessary.
Agreed. Then we'll allow him to accompany us.
Naya, is something bothering you?
Not really... I just feel like... Angel, it seems that you've really changed.
If this was you in the past, you would've never measured someone's value with personal interests in mind...
... Because I don't want to lose again.
I get that; I want to win as well! But, I'm still worried that...
I'm a leader now. I have to guide everyone to victory in this war.
If I put too much emotion into any of my decisions, then we will never be able to reach the end goal of reclaiming the kingdom.
...To be frank with you, I don't really understand.
Naya...!?
My friend is the simple and lovable Angel. For a mere soldier like me, I really can't understand the high-and-mighty princess Angelia.
Security officer Rosset, you've mistaken what the princess meant. The Princess- as well as all of us; we all truly need your strength.
Is that so?
I'll go make the preparations for the trip. Strategist Hyde, princess Angelia, I'll take my leave.
